comment: Hell yeah!  Great brew.  I really like GP, it has a very nice bready flavor, without being as malty as the more popular Maris Otter.  And of course, Citra is practically cheating.  I had a few people who hardly drink beer try this one, and they couldn't believe the flavors.  I didn't put the mash, but I'd probably shoot for the middle of the range, 154 or so.  And if I did it again, I'd probably double the DH.
